text: The Sins of Rachel Cade is a 1961 American drama movie directed by Gordon Douglas and was based on the 1956 novel by Charles Mercer. It stars Angie Dickinson, Roger Moore, Peter Finch, Errol John, Woody Strode, Scatman Crothers, Mary Wickes and was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * Category:1961 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Gordon Douglas Category:Movies set in the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:Movies set in the 1940s
title: The Sins of Rachel Cade
